children.value: BitGenerator base class and SeedSequence used to seed the BitGenerators.
SeedSequence is derived from Melissa E. O'Neill's C++11
std::seed_seq
implementation, as it has a lot of nice properties that we want.
https://gist.github.com/imneme/540829265469e673d045 http://www.pcg-random.org/posts/developing-a-seed_seq-alternative.html
